news.title: The abbreviation of VEDA 2.0, 'Very Easy Development Architecture'
Defined a 4096-B O(1) Generic Virtual Memory along with CFMA technology, this is a memory foundation for storing data (variables & objects).
The department of PLD has decided to migrate the interpreter from Java to C, for effective code execution.
Announcing a new programming langugage 'GARUDA' - Generating Assembly Resources Using Direct Algebra (Compiler based)
